thread.title: Parents will totally relate to this mom’s brutally honest toilet rules
thread.title_full: Parents will totally relate to this mom’s brutally honest toilet rules

author: Kayla
title: Parents will totally relate to this mom’s brutally honest toilet rules
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
I’ve never had the distinct pleasure of being a parent, but I know from the other side of this that these bathroom rules are so true. My own mom doesn’t get an ounce of privacy and my siblings and I are grown! Sometimes there’s just no point in even having locks on the doors because that won’t keep us out. 
This poor mom just wanted five minutes to do her business by herself so she made these extremely relatable and funny “bathroom rules”. Only problem is this only works if your kids can read, so unfortunately this won’t save you from your screaming 3-year-old. 2 
Moms everywhere let out a universal laugh and even added some rules of their own. 3
